attributes.action: Stop Job Seekers Allowance for Under 21's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
JSA should not be allowed for under 21's. I, myself am under 21 years of age and know of people who do not find a job because they get paid to do nothing by the goverment. This does stop them getting a job and just spending the money on drugs instead. 

Its a shame it will affect those under 21 who are using it properly.

BUT...

Save it for those who really need it!!
